message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm interested in making a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $13000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $12000 for the product.
Bob, I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $12500.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go above $11500. I'm at my budget limit and I need to make a decision. I'll make one final offer of $11500 for the product.
